page.title: 09TOURISM IN GULVAL & MARAZION
page.content: Many people visit this part of Cornwall for their holidays, attracted by the sea, beaches, watersports, scenery and mild climate. There is a variety of accommodation available. The{caravan and camping}site at Eastern Green has spaces for touring caravans and tents. There are also static caravans which are lived in all year round. There are{holiday chalets} nearby as well for self-catering holidays. In Gulval there are holiday{cottages}available. For people who prefer a restful (but more expensive) holiday, the Kenegie Manor {Hotel}has full-board accommodation. There are chalets in the grounds of the hotel as well. Marazion is very popular, and has hotels and guest houses. Many residents offer{Bed and {Breakfast}facilities to visitors.
